field.emailType: Enter a valid email address (e.g. notify.me@gmail.com)
field.walletType: Enter a valid wallet address (starting with '0x' and followed by 40 characters)

error.fetching_cities_failed: An error occurred while fetching the city data. Try again later.
error.fetching_cities_failed_req_exhausted: An error occurred while fetching the city data. Try again in a minute.
error.error_fetching_location_data: An error occurred while fetching the data for this city. Try again later.
error.wrong_chain_description:
Follow the instructions in your wallet to switch to the '{{chain}}' blockchain.
If no instructions as shown, manually switch to the '{{chain}}' blockchain and then click 'Try again'.
error.wrong_chain_description2: Use <0>ChainList</0> to add the '{{chain}}' blockchain to your wallet.
error.insufficient_balance: Your wallet does not have enough funds to buy this policy.
error.unknown_error_during_tx: An unknown error occurred while submitting the transaction. Try again later.
error.approval_tx_failed: The approval transaction failed. Try again later.
error.application_tx_failed: The application transaction failed. Try again later.
error.referral_code_120: The referral code has been used too many times.
error.fetching_policies_failed: An error occurred while fetching the policies. Try again later.

select_location.selection_hint: Tap a marker to select that city

description.FragileShield: Protects your fragile objects. Lower tier shaking is covered.
description.HomeGuard: Protect your house. Higher tier shaking is covered.

checkout.title: New policy
checkout.accept_t_and_c: I've read and accepted the Terms & Conditions
checkout.trx_in_progress1: Follow the instructions in your wallet to
checkout.trx_in_progress2:
create an approval and
confirm application transaction

checkout_success.title: Transaction Complete
checkout_success.bought: Your application is being processed and will take two hours to finalize. Please ensure sufficient funds are available in your wallet during this time ({{amount}}).
checkout_success.thank_you: Thank you for choosing Flightdelay. We appreciate your trust in us.
checkout_success.thank_you2: The policy will take two hours to finalize. We will contact you when the process is finished if you enter your email address below.
checkout_success.thank_you3: If you don't want to do this, return to 'My policies' in two hours from now.
checkout_success.we_will_notify_you: You will receive an email when the policy is ready.
checkout_success.notification_details_submission_error: An unexpected error occurred while submitting your email address. Please try again later.

mypolicies.title: My Policies
mypolicies.wallet_not_connected: Connect your wallet to see your policies

transfer.title: Transfer Policy
transfer.instructions: The policy with ID {{nftId}} will be transferred to the address given below. To avoid mistakes, its recommended to copy and paste the address.
transfer.warning: Important: <0>Double check the recipient address before transferring the policy</0>. The transfer cannot be reversed.
transfer.confirmation: <0>Confirm the recipient address</0> again and click 'Continue' below or 'Abort' if the address is incorrect.
transfer.error_tx: An error occurred while submitting the transaction. Try again later.
